scripts.tauri:build: npm run build && bash -c 'source ~/.cargo/env 2>/dev/null || true; export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH"; npm run tauri build' && ./fix_bundle.sh
scripts.tauri:build:debug: npm run build && bash -c 'source ~/.cargo/env 2>/dev/null || true; export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH"; npm run tauri build -- --debug' && ./fix_bundle.sh
scripts.tauri:dev: bash -c 'source ~/.cargo/env 2>/dev/null || true; export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH"; tauri dev'
